name: DLTW
description:
The moment has come, the evil red shapes have arrived, the number one enemy of all the universe came to earth, and they are going to attack your reactor, to steal the energy crystal that powering the reactor, if the red shapes will take the crystal they will be able to use the energy for very evil purposes. Only the bravest of us will be able to defeat the red shapes!

good luck, the chosen one!

-------------------------------------------

minimum requirements:  windows 7 / 8 /10 / 11  or  OS X 10.7+ , PowerPoint 2010+

Recommended Requirements: windows 10/11 or macOS 11+ , PowerPoint 2016+

-------------------------------------------
